settings.heading: Raleigh Christmas Meal Delivery
settings.text:
The holiday season is about cherishing friends and family. But reminiscing over eggnog is almost impossible when you have hams to glaze, yeast rolls to bake, and a never-ending pile of dishes to wash.

This Christmas, let Table & Twine take the fuss out of your festive feast. Artfully prepared by talented chefs, our Raleigh Christmas meal kits free you up to trim the tree and open presents.

settings.heading: How Our Christmas Meal Kits Work
settings.text:
Table & Twine aims to make the yuletide season jolly by minimizing your time in the kitchen. Long gone are the days of stuffing turkeys and roasting butternut squash. When you order a Raleigh Christmas meal kit, our culinary team will handle these tedious tasks for you. You’ll just need to heat, garnish, and serve.

We offer a thoughtfully-curated Christmas dinner package that’s as delicious as it is convenient. We also offer à la carte holiday items, including [description here].

settings.title: Quick Preparation & Cleanup
settings.text: With Table & Twine, a restaurant-quality spread doesn’t need hours to prepare. Since our chefs cook up to 90% of your meal, you’ll only be responsible for the finishing touches. That means you can spend more time enjoying festivities and less time planning, shopping, chopping, and cleaning.

settings.title: Restaurant-Quality Flavors at Home
settings.text: It can be hard to find an eatery that’s open on Christmas, especially one that’ll dish out five-star entrées. Fortunately, when you order a Raleigh Christmas meal kit from Table & Twine, you can create restaurant-quality dishes in your very own kitchen for a fraction of the cost.

settings.title: Impressive Yuletide Dishes
settings.text: Together, we can prepare a decadent feast that’s sure to impress the family. Since each recipe has been developed by a professional chef, there’s a balance of savory flavors. And, since Table & Twine’s desserts are curated by our Executive Pastry Chef, you’ll finish on a high note.

settings.heading: Why Choose a Christmas Meal Kit?
settings.text: No matter if you love to cook or prefer to microwave your dinners, you’ll be impressed by the convenience of Table & Twine. When we provide at-home Mother’s Day catering in Raleigh, we work to ensure every customer benefits from:

settings.title: How much time is required to prepare the food in my Christmas meal kit?
settings.text: Bringing your Christmas meal to life should only take one to two hours. On the packaging of every dish, you’ll find a QR code. Scan this code for easy-to-follow heating instructions.

settings.title: How far in advance do I need to order my Christmas meal kit?
settings.text: To receive your meal kit for Christmas, please place an order by [insert date].

settings.title: Can I customize my Christmas meal kit?
settings.text: Table & Twine meal kits cannot be customized. However, our meals are crowd-pleasers among both adults and children.
